name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 14, Guangdong. A convenience store owner said: The current environment is really bad. The turnover from opening at 8 am to 7 pm is less than 700 yuan, and even the rent of the store is not earned back.
In this regard, many netizens who opened stores in the comment area also reflected that business was difficult. "I lost more than 700,000 yuan and transferred the tobacco and alcohol shop." "My turnover so far in 2024 is 0." "Today I sold a pack of 10 yuan cigarettes."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Cangzhou, Hebei, the "black and white plaques" of shops along Railway Station Road have sparked heated discussions, with some netizens calling it "Cangzhou Funeral Street". Currently, under the condemnation of public opinion, the government has removed the doorplates overnight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: CCTV National Emergency Broadcast Weibo said: The explosion in Huainan was caused by a partial burst of a heating pipe, and 4 people were slightly injured. A passerby found that Chaoyang East Road had been closed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 11, a large number of Chinese people in New York, USA participated in the protest against the New York Department of Labor for not paying enough wages, which was suspected of being illegal. A Chinese representative gave a speech in Chinese at the scene. Participants in the protest said: Caregivers work 24 hours a day, but only receive 13 hours of wages. They demanded that the Labor Bureau pay the hard-earned money that has been underpaid for many years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up of a school in Nanchang mechanically clapping to welcome its leaders:
On December 13, the Nanchang 12345 Mayor's Hotline responded that after investigation, the school's clapping method was inappropriate. The person named in the video pointed out on the spot that this welcoming method was inappropriate and needed to be corrected immediately. The school has made corrections on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 14, China Business News reported that a programmer who died abnormally during the police-designated residence period was found not guilty. On December 6, the Xinbarhu Left Banner Public Security Bureau of Inner Mongolia decided to withdraw the case of "Competitive League Texas Hold'em APP suspected of opening a casino" because there was no criminal fact. Previously, the online post "Family of Xing Yanjun | Hulunbuir cross-provincial arrest, my brother died during the designated residence period, crying for the autonomous region to investigate the truth" was once popular. On the Internet, information such as "cross-provincial arrest", "suicide during designated residence" and "online casino" in this case have become hotly discussed keywords. China Business News previously made an exclusive report on this case (see China Business News on May 12, 2024 "After a cross-regional arrest, a programmer died during the "designated residence" period"). On December 14, the reporter learned from the attorney that the property involved in the case has been unsealed. For the abnormal death of Xing Yanjun, the family will be held accountable in accordance with the wishes of the family.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a five-star grilled fish takeaway restaurant in Guiyang was exposed to be washing fish in a patinated toilet, and the cut fish was placed directly on the moldy and blackened ground next to the squat toilet, and the hygiene conditions on the scene were worrying.
The store sold thousands of orders per month and was the top store on the praise list in the area.
At present, the Municipal Supervision Bureau has come to deal with it, and the store has temporarily suspended business for rectification.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At about 7:00 on December 14, a fire broke out near the service center on the south side of Dalian Station, the transfer station between Dalian Metro Line 3 and Line 5. Black smoke billowed at the scene, and a large section of the subway bridge was smoking. According to the Dalian Municipal Emergency Response News Office, the fire was under control at about 8:00, and there were no casualties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At noon on December 14, a father and a child attempted to commit suicide by jumping off the Renmin Bridge in Guangzhou, Guangdong. People around him persuaded the man: "Don't be depressed!" "The child is still so young!"
It was said online that the man was forced to do so because of income.
Some netizens said that more than 20 people have committed suicide by jumping off the bridge in Waisha Bridge in Shantou this year, and there are patrols there every day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, China Industrial News reported that more than 100 migrant workers at the Friendship Mansion construction site in Yuncheng, Shanxi Province were owed wages. The company involved had promised to pay wages many times and even signed a letter of commitment but never fulfilled it.
China Industrial News intervened to collect wages, but the company still did not settle the overdue wages.
It is reported that China Industrial News is a state-owned institution under the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission and the official newspaper of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 14, a large number of owners of Jitie Xinyuan Community in Shijiazhuang gathered to defend their rights because of a two-day water outage. A large number of police and special police arrived at the scene and warned the owners that this was illegal and asked them to report to the property management. The owners asked back: "Who violated the law? (Water supply) is the most basic life guarantee for the people. We also contacted the developer and the property management, but they passed the buck to each other."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen provided an article to supplement: This incident involved "distant-sea fishing" enforced by the Inner Mongolia police across the border to Beijing. The deceased programmer was also a shareholder. His company had no business in Inner Mongolia, and the police detained him across 1,500 kilometers in the absence of sufficient evidence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 13, a Chinese who went to Russia to join the army said: Recently, another four Chinese were killed in the battle. Those who are planning to join the army in Russia should not come. First of all, it is difficult to communicate effectively here due to the different languages. The battlefield is very cruel, and it is difficult to eat or sleep well. "Seven out of ten Chinese who come here will regret it, and the final result is likely that they will not be able to go back."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, China announced that Nvidia was suspected of violating antitrust laws and launched an investigation into it.
A text began to circulate on major social media platforms: "Huang Renxun lost the Chinese market, got drunk on the streets of Vietnam late at night, his hair turned white overnight, his favorite leather jacket was gone, and he only wore a T-shirt, showing his decadence."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 14, Nanchang, Jiangxi. After Li Yixue posted a video asking for help on the social platform, a large number of netizens began to leave messages under the Nanchang Public Security account, asking about her current situation. The "Nanchang Public Security" and "Nanchang West Lake Public Security" accounts then turned on the "ban comment mode". Some enthusiastic citizens also called the local police, but the phone number of the Nanchang Public Security Bureau West Lake Branch could not be reached.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reuters reported the details of Assad's escape: A few hours before leaving, he told his generals and intelligence chiefs that Russian aid was on the way, and even his brother Maher, who was in charge of the elite troops, was kept in the dark. He told his office director that he would go home after get off work, but actually went straight to the airport. He asked a media consultant to come to his house to write a speech, but when he arrived, he found that he had already withdrawn and did not even do anything to mobilize the army.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 14, in Xinhe County, Hebei Province, two seals were pasted on the firewood stoves in the homes of local residents by Zhongyu Gas Co., Ltd., prohibiting villagers from using firewood stoves.
On the 15th, the gas company responded: This is to eliminate safety hazards, and double fire sources are not allowed in villagers' homes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, major banks in China have been promoting the opening of "personal pension" accounts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the fall of the Assad regime in Syria, on December 15, a blogger released a video of Assad being interviewed by CCTV last year.
In the video, the host asked: What is your biggest spiritual support? Assad replied, "My biggest spiritual support is the support of the people."
Netizens replied, "Serious nonsense" "In fact, the people hate him to death" "Familiar taste, same recipe"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 15, Australia. A Chinese tourist took off a drone from the deck of a warship, and then flew the drone to another warship to film the soldiers on the warship.
The Chinese tourist said, "I took off and landed perfectly on the deck of the Australian Navy, turned around and teased (the soldiers) to leave. They don't even have anti-drone suppressors. Oh, how unsophisticated."
Some netizens reminded that this behavior may be illegal. He said: The police just asked him not to do it again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Kazakhstan's State Counselor: Yerlan Kalin visited Renmin University of China to give a speech and share Kazakhstan's experience in reforming its population policy.
Wang Xianju, Press Counselor of the Chinese Embassy in Belarus, asked: "There are many children in Kazakhstan. How can female college students believe you so much and give birth to children honestly and obediently, early and more?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Shen Yi, a professor at Fudan University, talked about Taiwan in a program: Don’t think too much about the Taiwanese people. Taiwan and Hong Kong were both colonies. You only need to beat them up as colonies. Taiwan has now consumed the goodwill of the mainland. .

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, the Ukrainian Military Intelligence Agency (HUR) disclosed on Saturday that a "friendly fire" incident occurred between Russian and North Korean troops in Kursk Oblast, and eight Russian soldiers were shot dead by North Korean soldiers. The incident was said to be related to the language barrier between the two armies.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the tenth batch of national centralized bulk drug procurement was launched.
Among them, the bids for enteric-coated aspirin tablets and folic acid tablets reached 3 cents per tablet in this round of procurement; in addition, a total of 31 pharmaceutical companies participated in the bidding for phloroglucinol injection, and the company with the lowest bid was 0.22 yuan per bottle.
In this regard, many netizens are worried about whether the efficacy of such a cheap drug can be guaranteed, and some netizens suggest canceling the special supply.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, a large number of people gathered outside the Wenjiang District Government in Chengdu to protest against the government's construction of a crematorium in the area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/g9xjBWGELs

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 15, the Russian Satellite News Agency reported: Medvedev believes that today, Ukraine faces a choice: either stay with Russia or disappear completely from the world map.
Netizens responded "I drank too much vodka and my brain is broken"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 13, Song County, Henan. A man visited a poor old man who lived in a dilapidated tile house and drank collected rainwater. The old man said that his father, mother and brother had died one after another. This year, his brother's illness became more and more serious. He didn't eat for three days and only drank a little soup on the fourth day, and then he passed away. The old man said that he had been sad after his brother's death. He was the only one left in the family of four. The old man wiped his tears while speaking

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen said on the forum that on December 13, he went to Nanjing Purple Mountain to shoot a micro-film about the Battle of Nanjing. As he was filming the Kuomintang army, he was stopped by seven or eight local police officers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the chairman of Xiaopeng Motors said that the entire factory has started a 20-hour two-shift mode, and employees only have one day off a week, and the rest of the time they are working hard to produce, which has caused dissatisfaction and resistance from netizens.
Netizens replied, "I finally understand why foreign countries want to increase tariffs" "I don't support two-shift work, so I won't buy your car"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 10, economist Xing Ziqiang said: Now is not the stage where confidence can be boosted by words alone. The specific details of real money are more important than words.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Shaoyang, Hunan. Jincheng Town Middle School, a female student was bullied and slapped by her classmates.
The local leaders notified the village party secretaries in the group to pay attention to whether there are relevant videos and negative information in the village group, and once found, they should ask the forwarder to delete it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens called the local police to inquire about Li Yixue's whereabouts.
The police responded: They are investigating.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 14 (Release) China's Deputy Permanent Representative to the United Nations Geng Shuang stated at the Security Council: China urges relevant countries to immediately unfreeze and return Afghanistan's overseas assets.
Netizens responded, "How can I get the wages owed in China?" "Will the government use the money for people's livelihood after unfreezing it?" "Use them to pay the wages"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Ma Panyan, a party involved in the Chongqing "Wushan Child Bride" case, tells her story of being sold to someone else when she was 12 years old
